ul.li: Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where constraint = < 736665006 |Dose form administration method (administration method)| minus > (< 736665006 |Dose form administration method (administration method)|)

description.value: Le jeu de valeurs à utiliser pour coder l'élément *dosageInstruction.method* de la ressource *FrMedicationRequest*.
